title: The.Kings.Speech.2010.DVDSCR.XviD-iLG
description:
Genre: Drama, History

Rating:8.6

Country:UK, Australia

Plot Outline:Tells the story of the man who became King George VI, the father of Queen Elizabeth II. After his brother abdicates, George ('Bertie') reluctantly assumes the throne. Plagued by a dreaded stammer and considered unfit to be king, Bertie engages the help of an unorthodox speech therapist named Lionel Logue. Through a set of unexpected techniques, and as a result of an unlikely friendship, Bertie is able to find his voice and boldly lead the country through war.
